languages.text: "Давайте просуммируем все, что мы знаем. Денз, предположительно, оставил наследство Фиделио — женщине, которая хотела ему отомстить за убийство капитана корабля "Покаяние". Это слово записано в книге прощания, и запись совсем свежая. Значит ли это, что наша Фиделио где-то рядом?"

"Let's go over everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"
languages.original_text: "Давайте просуммируем все, что мы знаем. Денз, предположительно, оставил наследство Фиделио — женщине, которая хотела ему отомстить за убийство капитана корабля "Покаяние". Это слово записано в книге прощания, и запись совсем свежая. Значит ли это, что наша Фиделио где-то рядом?"

traits.locale_text: "Let's summarize everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the memory book, and the record is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

The word Repentance is written in the memory book, and the record is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

"Let's go over everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

languages.text: “咱们再来过一遍已经掌握的线索吧。丹兹把所有财产都留给了菲迪奥，这个女人曾打算向他复仇，因为他杀害了忏悔号的舰长。‘忏悔’这个词被某个人写在了悼念册上，而且是最近才写上去的。这是不是意味着，我们要找的菲迪奥就藏在附近的某个地方？”
languages.original_text: "Let's go over everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

traits.locale_text: “咱们再来过一遍已经掌握的线索吧。丹兹把所有财产都留给了菲迪奥，这个女人曾打算向他复仇，因为他杀害了忏悔号的舰长。‘忏悔’这个词被某个人写在了悼念册上，而且是最近才写上去的。这是不是意味着，我们要找的菲迪奥就藏在附近的某个地方？”

languages.text: «Vamos a repasar lo que sabemos. Supuestamente, Denz ha dejado todas sus posesiones a Fidelio, una mujer que quería vengarse de él por matar al capitán de la nave Arrepentimiento. Esa palabra está escrita en el libro del recuerdo, y la entrada es nueva. ¿Significa eso que Fidelio anda cerca?».
languages.original_text: "Let's go over everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

traits.locale_text: «Vamos a repasar lo que sabemos. Supuestamente, Denz ha dejado todas sus posesiones a Fidelio, una mujer que quería vengarse de él por matar al capitán de la nave Arrepentimiento. Esa palabra está escrita en el libro del recuerdo, y la entrada es nueva. ¿Significa eso que Fidelio anda cerca?».

languages.text: 「今知っていることをおさらいしよう。デンツは自分の財産をフィデリオに相続させるつもりだった。彼女はリペンタンス号の船長を殺したデンツに復讐しようとしていた。リペンタンスという言葉が追悼の書に書き残されており、筆跡も新しい。つまり、噂のフィデリオは近くにいるということか？」
languages.original_text: "Let's go over everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

traits.locale_text: 「今知っていることをおさらいしよう。デンツは自分の財産をフィデリオに相続させるつもりだった。彼女はリペンタンス号の船長を殺したデンツに復讐しようとしていた。リペンタンスという言葉が追悼の書に書き残されており、筆跡も新しい。つまり、噂のフィデリオは近くにいるということか？」

languages.text: "Fassen wir unseren bisherigen Wissensstand zusammen. Denz hat seinen Besitz angeblich Fidelio hinterlassen – einer Frau, die sich an ihm rächen wollte, weil er den Captain des Schiffs Repentanz getötet hat. Das Wort 'Repentanz' steht im Kondolenzbuch, und der Eintrag ist neu. Bedeutet das, dass unsere Fidelio sich irgendwo in der Nähe aufhält?"
languages.original_text: "Let's go over everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

traits.locale_text: "Fassen wir unseren bisherigen Wissensstand zusammen. Denz hat seinen Besitz angeblich Fidelio hinterlassen – einer Frau, die sich an ihm rächen wollte, weil er den Captain des Schiffs Repentanz getötet hat. Das Wort 'Repentanz' steht im Kondolenzbuch, und der Eintrag ist neu. Bedeutet das, dass unsere Fidelio sich irgendwo in der Nähe aufhält?"

languages.text: « Passons en revue ce que nous savons déjà. Denz aurait légué toutes ses possessions à une certaine Fidélio, une femme qui a essayé de le tuer pour venger le capitaine du vaisseau Repentance. Le mot Repentance a été récemment inscrit dans le livre du souvenir, ce qui pourrait signifier que Fidélio est dans les parages. »
languages.original_text: "Let's go over everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

traits.locale_text: « Passons en revue ce que nous savons déjà. Denz aurait légué toutes ses possessions à une certaine Fidélio, une femme qui a essayé de le tuer pour venger le capitaine du vaisseau Repentance. Le mot Repentance a été récemment inscrit dans le livre du souvenir, ce qui pourrait signifier que Fidélio est dans les parages. »

languages.text: "Bildiklerimizin üzerinden geçelim. Denz tüm varlığını Tövbe gemisinin kaptanını öldürdüğü için kendisinden intikam almaya kalkışan bir kadına, yani Fidelio'ya bıraktı. Tövbe kelimesi, anma defterinde yazılıydı ama belli ki yeni kaleme alınmış. Tüm bunlar Fidelio'nun yakınlarda bir yerde olduğu anlamına mı geliyor?"
languages.original_text: "Let's go over everything we know. Denz supposedly left his possessions to Fidelio — a woman who wanted to take revenge on him for killing the captain of the ship Repentance. The word Repentance is written in the book of remembrance, and the entry is new. Does this mean that our Fidelio is somewhere close by?"

traits.locale_text: "Bildiklerimizin üzerinden geçelim. Denz tüm varlığını Fidelio'ya, Tövbe gemisinin kaptanını öldürdüğü için kendisinden intikam almaya çalışan kadına bıraktı. Tövbe kelimesi anma defterine daha yeni yazılmış. Tüm bunlar Fidelio'nun yakınlarda bir yerde olduğu anlamına mı geliyor?"
